tool_description: Tiktok Downloader.The fastest way to download without watermark video from tiktok.
name: Tiktok Video Downloader
title: Tiktok Video Downloader

api_list.name: Video
api_list.description: This will return  the details of video and download link
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-downloader3.p.rapidapi.com/video/https://www.tiktok.com/@cznburak/video/7092372259846753537?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=tr-TR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-downloader3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-video-downloader3.p.rapidapi.com/video/{link}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-video-downloader3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
